snippet.title: Aerion: The Last Alchemist | Demo v.0.2.1
snippet.description:
Aerion is a cozy casual fantasy adventure game where you explore flying islands, create potions, and help magical creatures save their environment. Each island is filled with unique creatures and biomes. Without your help, these will vanish. 

Add our game to your wishlist on Steam.
